div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, Mar. 26, 1914. RUMANIAN JEWISH CONGREGATION PURCHASES BEZALEL DIADEM

body.p: The diadem (a crown to be placed in synagogue's Holy Ark) for the Rumanian Congregation was bought yesterday through a committee consisting of A. Bernard, S. J. Wolfson, Mr. Aronstein, and Mr. Nochman. The beautiful crown cost $190, and the purchase was realized through the initiative of Mr. Wolfson, who had promised to donate $100 provided the Congregation would pay the balance. The synagogue accepted this proposal and the sale was completed.
Note:- Bezalel is the name of an art school in Jerusalem.
